rows.label: tlk46500171_01_msg0001
rows.name:
Hmm... Mmmmnnhhhh... How should
I go about carving from here...?

rows.label: tlk46500171_01_msg0002
rows.name:
Oh, hello. My name's Gianluca,
and I'm working on this sculpture.

rows.label: tlk46500171_01_msg0003
rows.name:
I started out determined to carve
the finest sculpture in all of Alst, but
after 20 years, I still haven't finished it.

rows.label: tlk46500171_01_msg0004
rows.name:
At this point, my life's goal is to finish
this masterpiece before I die! But I'm
so torn over how best to proceed...
